summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 45E, page 119 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, to rezone property on the West Side of 25th ave. S. and the East Side of 24th Ave. S., North of S. Jackson St. from Multiple Residence Low Density Zone (RM 800) to Community Business Zone (BC) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement, (Petition of the City of Seattle, Department of Community Development C.F. 286382, Hearing Examiner No. X-76-169).
